Method Detail

createComponents

protected void createComponents()
Description copied from class: View
Creates and initializes the components that populate this view. This method should only create/initialize the component objects, but not actually add them to the panel. Laying out the components on the panel is done by the layoutComponents method.
PRE:
None
POST:
The components for this view have been created

Overrides:
createComponents in class View

POST:
